title: Aaron Rodgers, Chiefs-49ers, and where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Chiefs-49ers, and where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin explains why he was never sold on the Green Bay Packers, why Aaron Rodgers isn't one of his favorite quarterbacks, what to expect when the Chiefs play the 49ers, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Antonio Cromartie, A. J. Hawk, Trent Dilfer, and Tony Gonzalez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
